mapper.select: SELECT t.*, (SELECT count(*) FROM comment where tidx = t.tidx) as comment_cnt FROM task t where t.pidx = #{pidx} order by t.update_date desc
SELECT * FROM task where pidx = #{pidx} and parent = #{parent}

SELECT t.*, (SELECT count(*) FROM comment where tidx = t.tidx) as comment_cnt, (SELECT title FROM project where pidx = t.pidx) as project_title FROM task t where t.pidx in (SELECT pidx FROM project_access where mid = #{mid}) order by t.update_date desc limit 10
SELECT * FROM google_calendar_connected where midx = #{midx} and tidx = #{tidx}

SELECT t.*, (SELECT count(*) FROM comment where tidx = t.tidx) as comment_cnt, (SELECT title FROM project where pidx = t.pidx) as project_title, (SELECT html_url FROM google_calendar_connected WHERE tidx = t.tidx AND midx = #{midx}) as html_url FROM task t where t.pidx in ( SELECT pidx FROM project_access where mid = #{mid} ) AND (t.start_date between #{start} and #{limit} OR t.limit_date between #{start} and #{limit}) order by start_date asc, limit_date asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task SET pidx = #{pidx}, depth = #{depth}, parent = #{parent}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, start_date = #{start_date}, limit_date = #{limit_date}, state = 0, register_date = now(), update_date = now();
INSERT INTO google_calendar_connected SET midx = #{midx}, tidx = #{tidx}, id = #{id}, html_url = #{html_url};
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, start_date = #{start_date}, limit_date = #{limit_date}, update_date = now() WHERE tidx = #{tidx}
UPDATE task SET depth = #{depth}, parent = #{parent} WHERE tidx = #{tidx}
UPDATE task SET state = 0 WHERE tidx = #{tidx}
UPDATE task SET state = 1 WHERE tidx = #{tidx}
UPDATE task SET state = 2 WHERE tidx = #{tidx}
